QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: ProcessOfJob describes that the referenced Process is the result of the execution of the Job. A Job may cause multiple Processes to run, perhaps on different operating systems. This is allowed by the '*' cardinality of the Process reference. Note that a Process can result from only one Job - hence, the '0..1' cardinality on Job.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: Execution of the Job results in the creation of the Process referenced as PartComponent. The Job aggregates the Process(es) that are created when it is executed.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The Process that results from the execution of the Job.
